bibl.title: The Meaning of Sunt( ) in Tax Lists and Tax Receipts. <sunt( )>
bibl.note: The abbreviated expression X sunt( ) eﬁw Y should be supplied as X sÁn t(a›w) eﬁw Y. Ta›w refers to értãbaiw or draxma›w, depending on the nature of the taxes. The expression should be translated as: "(the drachmas / artabas charged on) X together with the (drachmas / artabas) charged on Y". <X sunt( ) eis Y, X sun t(ais) eis Y, tais, artabais, drachmais>
SMOLDERS Ruben, The Meaning of Sunt( ) in Tax Lists and Tax Receipts. <sunt( )>
